documents.document: for the first time in my entire life i've booked a hotel 6 months in advance for an event 😂 hello 1975 at trnsmt 💞
started to panic about flight prices so this week will mainly be spent trying to convince my mum to come to dublin for the 1975 😂
eh where to start... https://t.co/hgXcTcbrZv
forgot what it feels like to wake up without being totally choked and horrible🙃 so fed up of this illness 😟
my tattoo is so itchy tonight 🙃 spending 70% walking around the living room slapping my thigh 😂

i accept this accolade. https://t.co/iTOBhgeDWJ
@jnnfrgrhm tweet of the day 💞
@jnnfrgrhm it's a dream unless you have tequila too. which i do 8/10 times 😂
@jnnfrgrhm you know i HATED it but recently it's a dream for gin hangovers. fanta made me sick last time 😂
@jnnfrgrhm it doesn't always work - i've gone to the irn bru side for gin hangovers 😂 but it doesn't work for any other types....
off through to glasgow tonight for a gig and cathouse 💞 but have a night out tomorrow night...this can only end badly 🙃
@jnnfrgrhm @hassinaax it seems we like this time of year 😂🍸 https://t.co/yWUM5vXPZM
@jellymalin i was like this then learnt to keep the flavour in for longer and it worked!

@DecadeEdinburgh fingers crossed!

@DecadeEdinburgh it's all because it's back downstairs 😉stay downstairs plz!!
most weeks i wish i could drive to glasgow for gigs to make life easier...then i remember cider exists😂
can't exercise this week so decided i'd be good. yesterday i ate half an easter egg and tonight my weight in sticky toffee pudding🙃
@BensonsFruity ahh i absoutely LOVE the little bee on your website! 😍
@markaudiowave ‘afterward you are dead’ 😶
everyone in the office is out so i’m working soundtracked by a throwback thursday playlist - it’s gone from savage garden to peter andre...

@colourscarousel congrats on the big 10k! 🎉💞

any tight clothes make my leg itch so badly so i've resorted to wearing variations on baggy trousers all week. pretending it's 'boho chic' ✨
@eneaux no chance! i only want one thing 😟
having totally strong cravings for a proper dessert but nowhere will deliver unless it's over £15 😭#singleproblems

can a power cut only affect one room?! 😂 every other room has power but all the plugs have stopped working in kitchen... #edinburgh
@girlsparked it's all the plugs! kettle, fridge, freezer etc are off
@girlsparked nope - we've checked that!

back to work today so my body decided to wake me up essentially every hour thinking i was gonna sleep in 🙃
@JameskCarr @JoeytheElk just another reason to hate you.
@JameskCarr @JoeytheElk shut up young one. oldies can't cope with hangovers. you're young.
@JoeytheElk @JameskCarr don't say that!! this needs to leave my system asap.
i think 25 is the age when you become too old for drinking all night. it's 9pm and i'm still rough and exhausted despite naps allll day 😂
@Talor_Gilchrist wahhh it doesn't reach my postcode 😩
@therichardcobb i'll show this tweet as my invite.
@garywillerton re-wrap three times a day for 3 days then coconut oil!
less than a week and my tattoos almost healed ✨ new method is the best!
@therichardcobb where was my invite?
@lisa_x tonight i wish i didn't 😂
@lisa_x i'm walking about with one eyelash on cause the other hates me 😂
when pre drinks are at yours but you're still lay on the sofa in your pyjamas unshowered and listening to music. should probably move 😂
i really want to go back to california 😟 watching vlogs instead of getting ready and need to go back 💞
@DecadeEdinburgh that's not very nice! (i will)
my cold won't go away so i'm taking it to @DecadeEdinburgh 😂 there's nothing gin won't fix...
'he's not the one, he's 'a one' and that's all i need right now' - how i love raised by wolves 😂
